metadata.title: CVE-2022-22757 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Remote Agent, used in WebDriver, did not validate the Host or Originheaders. This could have allowed websites to connect back locally to theuser's browser to control it.
*This bug only affected Firefox whenWebDriver was enabled, which is not the default configuration.*. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 97.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
